website_summaries.verdict: A high-value system that’s at its best when used between rider and pillion passenger.
pros: All the features you’d expect in a comfortable package with washable liner
Extra cheek pads available to adjust fit

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 4 hours I had it...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this helmet after reading the great reviews. I received it yesterday and immediately went our for a ride. The helmet fit perfectly and the Music playback and phone call features worked great. I was very happy. That is, until I left the store to go home. I lowered the faceplate and heard a snap. The left side of the plate is hanging off the helmet. When I get home I try to see what it was, maybe just a clip. No, it was the bolt holing the left side of the plate to the helmet. The head of the bolt simply snapped off from normal use of less than 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Theres better bt helmets for the price
customer_reviews.text: The good: bt controller is relatively user friendly, sound quality is good provided youre not at highway speeds, mic clarity is good as well. The bad: sun visor doesnt stay all the way up, when its "retracted" it still sags down about 1/8" which is an annoying obstruction of view. It makes loud/obnoxious beeps whenever you turn it on/off. Wind cuts thru the helmet really bad, wind noise is deafening at highway speeds
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
customer_reviews.text: Barely 600 miles put on a new bike with this helmet and the visor mechanism spring loaded piece is malfunctioning and not letting the visor open and close properly. It's really not good when your visor pops off going down the road. Liked the helmet up until then. Update. NOW after one year use, two years owned, the blue tooth has stopped working and there is NOT a replacement part available. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
customer_reviews.author: ALonelySpoon

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth knob broke off.
customer_reviews.text: So this isn't necessarily a fair review to some people. Maybe I had a fluke. But on my second ride using it, the knob for the Bluetooth went flying off. Rendering it basically useless. So I returned the helmet. Otherwise, good helmet, if it was a different design on that piece, I'd still have it today.
customer_reviews.author: C.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great finish,  terrible Bluetooth functionality.
customer_reviews.text: This review will be broken down in segments: -The exterior: finish is excellent. I really enjoy the matte black and the smooth finish. - the controls for the Bluetooth and the sunvisor are in terrible spots. Helmet interior: Good protective padding. Great field of vision. Sizing is way off . Ordered and xl which barely fits. The drop down sun visor literally rests on my nose. Now to the biggest Problem. I purchased this for the Bluetooth functionality. The controls are terrible and useless for anything but turning volume up and down. The sound quality is about what I would expect for tiny speakers. Tinny sounding yet loud enough to hear at highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the helmet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two helmets because I needed to communicate with my husband during our rides. Pairing them was super easy and then pairing with our phones, also very easy. When a call comes in, the helmet will automatically take the call and the intercom between the two helmets disables. When the call is finished, the intercoms enable automatically! Easy! I have yet to attempt to pair the boombox on our trike. The helmet keeps out the wind noise because it has a nice section that fits closely around my lower face. I didn't realize how noisy my old modular helmet was until I wore this one.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor 'used-looking' packaging left a lot to be desired...
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was fine... However, the helmet's actual box had clearly been opened and closed several times and looked like a used manufacturer's box... also, the smaller box inside which contained charger, cable and a battery had been opened and closed frequently enough that it was actually torn along the line of the tab. The helmet itself seems new - but given the condition of the helmet's boxes, any purchaser would question that. I will say that for over $200 including shipping, I certainly expected a much higher level of packaging as opposed to what I received. It would leave anyone wondering if the merchandise contained in it was actually new....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fit is somewhere between a small and a medium
customer_reviews.text: They don't have a small, and the medium is slightly large but can make do. What is surprising is that I can operate Siri vocally from my helmet. Now I have access to music, phone, or GPS as needed, which is why I bought the helmet. The volume can be controlled by Siri on the phone and the control on the side of the helmet. Since I ride alone, I have no need to communicate with other bikers.
customer_reviews.author: Nathine Goldenthal

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE,
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did their part, prompt and reliable delivery . Ive been riding for years and have wore several different helmets , ONEIL, BELL among others . first thing I noticed was how light the helmet was, finish seemed nice nothing fancy but acceptable. tried to put it on and it was way to small. I wear an XL and this was tiny. double check the invoice and helmet tag. Sizing was way off. helmet seemed cheap and flimsy. lining wasn't quality like some others in this price range. would not recommend this product. sticking with my Oneil for now.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very attractive look but cheap compared to other helmets on the market. Bluetooth would not connect to Apple iPhone 7+ so that was a major issue. Didn't feel like it was worth the money just for the Bluetooth capability.
customer_reviews.author: Corey W.

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Don't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: JUNK. I made the mistake of listening to the reviews. The only redeeming features of this helmet are the looks and the speakers sound good. BUT, the volume and call controls are absolutely junk. To turn the volume down, you have to turn it counter clockwise, but that just unscrews the control from the knob it's supposed to turn to turn the volume down AND to activate the FM radio feature. It doesn't even work when you want to turn the volume UP. it just spins. Whoever came up with this idea for controls needs fired. JUST USE BUTTONS!
customer_reviews.author: 307 Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and NO bluetooth battery
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged. The box looked fine but the bag the helmet was in had some tears. Helmet was scraped and damaged. Also there was NO battery, bluetooth transmitter and plug/cord for charging. Maybe this was a return already, this would explain missing pieces. Waiting on refund. Helmet was sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Unlike any available in the market
customer_reviews.text: This HELMET is a dream helmet. It looks attractive, The interior is firm but smooth and soft, the Blue Tooth is fantastic. worked right a way. The entire electronics (the module, earphone and the microphone) are so well made and fitted so perfectly you don't even feel their existence inside the helmet. I really like the duel option on the face shield. There is one clear and one tinted . So I don't have to switch. It is built in to the helmet. I strongly recommend this unit. The medium size fitted the 22.5 inch (my head measurement) perfectly. Cant wait for the snow and ice to go away so I can ride my bike.
customer_reviews.author: TJ49

customer_reviews.title: SIZING INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Although it seems to be a well made produce, sizing is not accurate. According to sizing chart, my head measures exactly 24" and should require an XL Helmet (the largest they offer). Although I could get the helmet on, it was way too tight. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Great helment
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of full helmets but this one is actually comfortable. It connected to my phone without an issue, each time the helment is powered on it automatically connects to my phone. This isn't Bose quality sound, but it is pretty good. The battery life seems to be pretty good as well. Plenty of vents on the helmet that can be opened to provide more air to keep you cool.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Touchstone

customer_reviews.title: They are OK.
customer_reviews.text: Bought extra large, it fits ok around my head but it's tight on my chin, I have a beard and it bothers me, but it's bearable. Also the speakers are so so, too much treble, it almost hurts my ears if the volume is turned up loud. I have a second helmet and when paired together and talking with my passenger, there is a lot of static. And combined with too much treble, and a Harley Davidson, well you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend hated it. Hardly any padding
customer_reviews.text: They spent money on bluetooth but should have concentrated on more padding. Immediately returned after boyfriend wore it on a ride. Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gartrellgirl

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit for an XL. Tighter than any other XL I own. Visor is very stiff and difficult to raise and can not be done with one hand . Could not connect Bluetooth after trying ever imaginable method for 1-1/2 hours. Bluetooth code on phone is not the same as manual states it should be . No customer service number provided, only an email which I sent a message to yesterday and still not heard back from. Just overall not happy and will be returning this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth helmet works perfectly and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this! Got this as a gift for my husband and he says it is amazing!! He can finally listen to his music from his phone without cords attached to the bike. He can make and accept phone calls and there is no wind noise or static during the call!! This is a little pricey, but WELL worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tweet46

customer_reviews.title: Poor Phone Audio. Not Very Comfortable. Fogs Up.
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding with this helmet for 6 months. The bluetooth for music is decent but it's terrible when trying to make calls. I'm told people can't hear me and that there's always a long echo making the conversation virtually impossible. The helmet sits a bit awkwardly on my head and I'm constantly trying to adjust it. I find myself always needing to raise the visor when stopped at red lights otherwise it begins to fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but close
customer_reviews.text: My head size is 22 1/4. The medium helmet fit perfectly. The Bluetooth seems to be pretty seamless. Have not used the phone yet but feel pretty sure I will be able to hear the person talking to me. As long as they know I’m biking then they will understand if I sound muffled. Not much base to the speakers and I wish the volume was a bit louder but it is adequate. The sun visor is bit distorted but not bad really. Mechanically, seems to be sturdy. My one biggest complaint is the inability to switch tracks. Better have a playlist you enjoy. All in all, I am pretty happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Patrick Hillen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet has worked quite well for me. I like the Bluetooth so can listen to music while riding and it keeps wind and bugs out very nicely. I couldn't ask for a better fit or performance. It was a great surprise to find it has a built in sun shield that comes down with a slide button. The only thing about the helmet I don't like is the chin strap latch, I would like the old type of latch but that is quite minor. It is a little heavy but not so much that it is uncomfortable. Great helmet and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: light weight modular helmet
customer_reviews.text: The first ride I went on wearing my new bluetooth helmet was very comfortable; however I had not installed the supplied battery. I rode about fifty miles and I felt very safe as I've never have had a helmet like this one before. Today I received a new battery set which I immediately charged and installed in my helmet. Wow! Great sound quality even at high speeds. I am very satisfied about buying this helmet. In years past I would buy bell helmets which are no better than this helmet. A lot of features included for a very low $$. Thanks s Doug
customer_reviews.author: doug y.

customer_reviews.title: The helmet looks fantastic, very sleek
customer_reviews.text: Bought the helmet to use because I wear glasses and wanted something versatile that has Bluetooth. The helmet looks fantastic, very sleek. The interior as someone mentioned before is uncomfortable, the Bluetooth itself is okay, but the speakers are unable to keep up even at 40mph. The helmet isn't ventilated well, either. The inadequate ventilation makes it difficult to wear in anything more than cool weather.
customer_reviews.author: Blake McCoy

customer_reviews.title: INSANELY CHEAP QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: got it and thought it was cool as hell, took it to my friend who was gonna teach me how to ride and after seeing what a real helmet feels like, there is no way on earth id trust my life to this helmet. returned it and got an icon airflite and the difference is insane, better feeling, better fit, better cushions, better everything. dont trust your life to some piece of cheap garbage just because it has bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price, CAN'T SKIP MUSIC
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is good overall for the price. The sun visor seems a little cheap compared to what I was expecting. You can hear the music clearly at high speeds but the sound quality definitely diminishes and I wouldn't want to hear that on a long trip. It looks great and the quick release for the face is very effective. It allows you to switch to FM radio but you can't skip songs using music apps. That's definitely my biggest complaint about the helmet. It's 2020, FM radio is outdated for most consumers. Skipping songs should definitely take priority as a function. It would definitely make for a more enjoyable and safe ride.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Grey

customer_reviews.title: Positives: visor and comfort....Negatives: speakers
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good helmet and would recommend it at its price point. The visor and tinted visor combo is very helpful, and the ability to lift the whole full face part up is very convenient. The BAD PARTS Where it lacks the most though is the speakers and Bluetooth system. The speakers are very bad and do not have good sound quality and the Bluetooth system can be a little finicky. If sound quality is a big thing for you get a helmet and purchase a good Bluetooth/headset combo separately. Overall it’s a good helmet for a new rider but it’s not a helmet I will keep forever
customer_reviews.author: Carl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over my last helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Before this I just had the helmet I got at walmart so I could drive the bike home from the dealer lol. Its much quieter, easy to get on and off, music is awesome while driving! Not much base but loud enough to hurt my ears if I turn it up. Im fine with it. Its more quiet too. There I s no such thing as a completly quiet helmet just get a car if thats what you want lol.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Vance

customer_reviews.title: Look at size chart when purchasing helemet
customer_reviews.text: Our helmets were received as promised. They were packed in separate boxes. The anti fog face shield was in separate box. Instructions were easy to follow (see video) Size chart is close. So far no problems with blue tooth set up. Intercom works great! I have had 1/2 helmets. 3/4 helmets for a lot of years. Wish I had gotten this helmet sooner. I got the red ones. They look sharp. I ride a Polaris Slingshot (black with red twist dynamic top) It matches great. We will check wind and other road noise tomorrow. Will try to include a pic tomorrow. Thanks ILM
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: The battery makes me want to ride into the nearest wall
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty this helmet is great. There is just one problem, the battery. The battery itself is fine, it’s the port where you plug a charger to it that’s terrible. I have went through two of them over the past four months, and I hardly even charge it. It seems as if the it’s barely hanging on, and at $40 for a replacement one... I am extremely disappointed, I really like this helmet, but without the Bluetooth that I bought it for it’s useless to me. And I am **** sure not buying another replacement one. Thought the first one I received must of been flawed, I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sinturion

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for any amount of time
customer_reviews.text: This helmet looks very nice, but the interior is just low quality. Pros: Good looking. Sunshade visor is a cool feature. Speakers are good quality. Cons: Unwearable! This helmet was very uncomfortable. The comfort padding is very thin and low quality. There was skin to plastic contact in the chin and forehead. I usually wear a large and I got an extra large, but it was still digging into my head. Basically the quality of the actual helmet and speakers are nice, but I wish they would drastically improve the lining and interior pads even if it meant increasing the price by 30 bucks or something. Oh well, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: don't buy if you wanna go fast or have a loud bike
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself isn't bad if you are going for inexpensive. The helmet is really noisy. Basically you cannot hear the Bluetooth speaker unless you are full volume due to road and wind noise. The helmet sits weird on my head with a lot of pressure in the middle of my forehead and none on my temples. The padding isn't top notch. The visor fogs up even when opened a smidge. The dark lens has some really bad warping that makes visibility kind of difficult, but it cuts the sunglare. Would recommend dropping the additional $100 or so and buying a quality helmet. This one isn't worth it unless you are riding a scooter around town (<40mph).
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B.

customer_reviews.title: this helmet is super comfy, but after only 4 months of semi ...
customer_reviews.text: this helmet is super comfy, but after only 4 months of semi regular use the battery pack broke just from plugging in the charger. I see a lot of bad reviews about the speakers but it plays classic rock just fine. the toggle switch on the side can be a pain in the ass to work through the options. I always just play blue tooth through my phone though so SOLVED that problem. lift face and both visors are still solid and don't show any signs of fatigue on the moving parts. all in all its a good Helmet. I just have to spend more money on another battery now I guess -DBLIII
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Not what I really expected.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was good but once on the bike the noise level was high. Lot of wind noise I could not here the bluetooth speakers. Button cannot raise tinted visor. I had to push it up by rIsing clear visor and pushing tinted by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: I have a $700 Shoei helmet I recently purchased. The ILM has about the same amount of wind noise. I can barely (mostly not) hear the Bluetooth speakers at speed. It’s about as comfortable as the Shoei. The Bluetooth is a bonus that I like for navigation. I believe this to be a reasonable purchase for someone who doesn’t want to spend the money for high end brainbox protection. If I didn’t already have the Shoei I’d probably call it good. If I could hear the Bluetooth speakers above 50mph I’d give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Glen A

customer_reviews.title: Connects to other BT devices.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GF and she loves it so far. The picture show a mic, but nothing in the box, so looked at reviews to find that it’s molded in. I also found the vendor says it won’t pair to another vendors BT, so I was ready to return. Fired up my Cardo to try it at least and it paired, worked fine, so keeping the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: nflskinfan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad helmet but the sound on the Bluetooth isn’t great anything over 50 on a Harley you can’t understand music or someone talking to you. I will use it for protection but won’t ever buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Battery Issues..
customer_reviews.text: Well, I really like the helmet but have issues. The box that is supposed to include the charger, cord, and instructions was not included when the helmet arrived.. The battery was, for some reason, already installed in the helmet. The battery does not work/charge.. Contacted support and they want to send me a new battery from CHINA which takes 20 days.... No batteries in the states?? Hope it gets resolved soon since I forked out $200 for a helmet that I can't use all of the functions..
customer_reviews.author: Charles Roney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable helmet. The Bluetooth has a great connection and was easy to set up. The sound is good enough to overcome the sounds of the road. I will probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: schlemm

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: very light Cons: Speakers are terrible Most of the helmet has less than 1/4 inch of padding Visor doesn’t function smoothly or easily Chin strap is cheep and looks weak and prone to failure
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet cheap visor clips
customer_reviews.text: i like my helmet so far. it pair with other brands, the speaker quality is pretty good and the customer service is awesome. they helped me with an issue on a Saturday night when most companies wouldn't even respond till Monday. the helmet is a little noisy at high speeds but I'm sure a little modification could fix that. battery lasts a long timeand the controls are easy to use after you get used to them. thanks! Visor clips will pop off with slightest bump. Springs and plastic will go flying and you will have a visor fly off or hang by a thread.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan s.

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in February but never got to use it because the bike I had didn’t have a good motor. Bought a new bike yesterday and the sound when playing music is distorted, I can’t hear anyone when talking on the phone and they hear the bike much more than they can hear me. It is comfortable though and has some nice features such as the built in sun screen and the front end lifts up. Just wish for better sound quality while listening to music and talking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: Decent helmet but I have my issues with it. Might have to step up in price if the amount if the road noise you here with this helmet is par for a $200 helmet. Other item is why not just ship it with the anti fog visor. You have to keep it cracked open which causes even more noise. Battery is of fragile design and now after second use it won’t go back in and I will have to order a replacement. It has 10 little baby pins that are easily damaged. Think I will use it as my spare and not invest anything more in it. All other features are pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: keith nelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor ventilation
customer_reviews.text: Poor ventilation, but looks great . Helmet fits well, looks great, felt awesome. But, Chin rests directly against the flip up. The ventilation is poor. With faceshield up, my glasses still fogged up. With shield down, I lost significant visibility in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect helmet for the money!! Bluetooth works great with my android phone. Haven't figured out the intercom with other Bluetooth helmets yet!! Love the modular feature!! Works great and stays locked up perfect for riding open faced!! Speakers could be better quality but again for the price it is well worth the money!! Plenty comfortable enough with ample padding to feel protected!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Fit
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fits right but the front edge that sits on your forehead is the most painful thing ever! It's like a razor cutting into your forehead! For that reason alone I would not buy this helmet again. I haven't decided if I will return it but this thing is very flawed. The speakers are junk but provide a distraction from boredom. Honestly, spend more money for a better helmet and skip this thing.
customer_reviews.author: SeeSeanRun

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet! Great customer service from ILMotors!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. The bluetooth works well! The speakers a little on the treble side, but still works really well. I bought the XL because I was just on or slightly under the min measurement. I had some fitment issues and ILMotor's shipped a free set of smaller padding which has fixed the looseness issues! They back their products! The modular fitting works well and since I wear glasses I would not imagine not using a modular helmet! What a pain that has to be and of all the modular's I've tried, for the price this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: it's near impossible to get good sound quality while riding
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it...it's near impossible to get good sound quality while riding. Would never take a call or even listen into a conference call while riding...too noisy. Good for background music only.
customer_reviews.author: iPass

customer_reviews.title: Helmet Review
customer_reviews.text: This helmet connects to other helmets very easily. Music plays nice and loud whike riding. My only complaint is the helmet does let a good amount of airflow into it which causes your microphone to sound like static for the person your talking to. I have three of the same helmets and 2 of three let a considerable amount of air into the helmet. Overall, this is a good product that I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: FRAGILE.  THE FIRST TIME I DROPPED IT, THE VISOR POPPED OFF AND TOOK ABOUT 10 MIN TO GET IT BACK ON.
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH ONE OF THE VENT CONTROLS BROKEN OFF. I WAS SO BUSY DID NOT GET A CHANCE TO SEND IT BACK. FOR THE MONEY, NOT SATISFIED. ACCORDING TO THE OWNER'S MANUAL, IT WILL SCRATCH EASY. ALSO THE FLAP THAT COVER'S THE RADIO MODULE, DOES NOT STAY TUCKED IN. SHOULD HAVE HAD VELCRO OR SOME OTHER TYPE OF FASTENER ON IT.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, I haven't tested how well it protects my head. I can speak to the fit and the Bluetooth. It sychs well with my I phone and is compatible with Siri voice commands. Music is clear and I can easily make and answer calls while riding with the caller having no idea I'm on a bike. Reviews on other helmets were critical of the Bluetooth quality. If this feature is important, give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Francis

customer_reviews.title: Runs little small
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice helmet. Xl is small didn't see a cal. Working on stretching it a little. Hurts ears after a while on. Bluetooth work excellent. The front release is a little different. So get familiar with the workings of helmet. Has a sunshade built in. Not need to have sunglasses . Other than my big empty head . Good product
customer_reviews.author: uniman

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could use some fine tuning
customer_reviews.text: a little tight in the front the back measurement. Wish the blue tooth could be used to skip forward or backward when listening to music. music stops when second helmet connects to mine to talk, but not if i initiate the helmet to helmet conversation (but then the second person's music stops), and i can't get the bluetooth control to restart the music. Need to keep phone on a visible mount to restart music. otherwise very satisfied with the helmet, cut wind noise out very well. can talk in normal voice and still be picked up clearly by mic, and speakers come through nice and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet thinking I would use it to listen to music while I ride. I put the helmet on, it didn't feel as comfortable as my $80 BILT helmet I bought from a motorcycle store. Also, the speakers weren't good at all. You might as well go buy a decent helmet that you like and add a SENA device like I did with much better speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Ambient wind noise at speeds over 50 mph greatly reduced audio usage. Cycle and  windsheild helps.
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Great price for the the multiple functional design. Visor, flip up chin and sun visor. Bluetooth works very well for speeds under 50 mph. A wind shield adds to Bluetooth usability at higher speeds. Improvement on seals around flip up would reduce ambient wind noise and make this a 5 out of 5 score. For the $ not a better helment on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cray

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Listening to music through the bluetooth is quite annoying. Only sometimes do I get through a whole song without a glitch. Faster speeds make it worse.
customer_reviews.author: VanKara

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't power on unless attached to a power source
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved everything about this helmet, except for the fact that it wouldn't power on unless it was attached to a power source. Really bummed about having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issues are known issues with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL. However, it fits like a small. Or, it doesn’t fit at all I should rather state. The sizing is definitely off quite a bit. I’ll update as soon as I get a response from ILM on how they handled the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth way too low
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this helmet sucks!! The volume is way too low. You can't toggle between tracks. It picked up a radio signal somehow. It's too big for my head. I hate this helmet!!
customer_reviews.author: chefsteph

customer_reviews.title: Terrible speakers
customer_reviews.text: Speakers were blown right out of the box, or they are just terrible quality. Not to mention the whole helmet felt cheap. Wouldn't trust my life with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: It saved me in my wreck. Had I not been wearing a helmet then I would have broken my neck. However, the sound of the speakers could use a little more bass. Overall, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I made a good purchase, it is of very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I made a good purchase, it is of very good quality. Maybe they should improve the audio system, but it connects very easily and it avoids to have external accessories
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR MASTERS

customer_reviews.title: saved my sons life
customer_reviews.text: my son wrecked his motor cycle 1 week after getting this helmet... it saved his life
customer_reviews.author: tom beck

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wind noises and cold air seems to pass through easily even with vents shut
customer_reviews.text: Bouggr this awhile ago but jyat started using ut. Snug fit. Trying to find ear pieces for CB that don't hurt. Lots of wind noises and cold air seems to pass through easily even with vents shut. Good gor the price but there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great aerodynamics
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few days and really like this helmet. It is really easy to put on and secure. I've noticed that at highway speeds this helmet has a very streamlined fit and doesn't feel like it wants to fly off my head like my tighter fitting Bell Revolver does. Audio quality is... alright but with a loud bike like I have I need earbuds anyway to protect my hearing and drown out the drone of the exhaust. This thing looks amazing as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Anti fog doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Alright visor, horrible anti fog and I cannot find any pinlock replacements for it. Bluetooth is almost impossible to hear at higher speeds
customer_reviews.author: Seth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better then I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It fits ok .its more for a round head I think .it heavy because of the com and the 3/4 function of the helmet . The com work really well better then I thought it would. I can talk to people at 50 60 mph with out a problem which was suprising
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ok helmet
customer_reviews.text: Ok helmet. Seams are a little too wind noisy. Bluetooth work great.
customer_reviews.author: Cassian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Microphone does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Decent helmet for the price. Everything seemed fine and dandy when unboxing, although once I connected my phones Bluetooth I am getting absolutely zero input from the helmet microphone. Hoping to get this rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is not pairing
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited you get this helmet. The reviews were all pretty good. When I followed the instructions and charged my helmet, the bluetooth would not pair to any device. Very disappointed and hoping the problem gets fixed. Directions/manual doesn't tell you how to eject the receiver either.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kehne Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - comfortable and works well
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but overall, I like the helmet. Bluetooth seems to work fine, but has had some quirks.... speakers could be a tad louder.. not much wind noise - certainly nothing to complain about.... will be buying another for my passenger. Well worth the money as a great value.... if you're on the fence, take the chance and buy - you'll be pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was nice when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: After the third time I wore the helmet, it was time to recharge the batteries. The charger port plug in the battery pack was gone. It has broke loose from the battery housing and was rattling around inside. I contacted customer service. They responded immediately with a new battery and a 15.00 refund for my trouble. Thank you Iris @ILM.
customer_reviews.author: Injun Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. I want to get one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I want to get one for my wife now ! Make sure to order one size up from you would normally wear....
customer_reviews.author: MDRSLK

customer_reviews.title: Unfrotunately I tested it..
customer_reviews.text: Went down on my bike the day after I got this. Was a fairly bad crash. Broke my leg and suffered a bunch of other injuries but none were to my head. The helmet checked out and I'm still using it just had to replace the visor. Battery life is great and and it is very comfortable at all speeds. The bluetooth feature works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for my 1st bluetooth helmet so I did not want to spend a bunch of money. I got this helmet and it does the trick. I go on the highway and I still can have a conversation. I don’t know what a $600 dollar one would sound like but for the money I’m good.
customer_reviews.author: leonardo ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good looks.
customer_reviews.text: One of the few good looking helmets with built in bluetooth. Controls take a few uses to get used to what they do, and function well. Sound is ok even with visor up for air flow but not as loud as with it closed.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet overal. The sound quality and battery Life is more than satisfactory. I gave them a lower rating initially because I had a problem with the charging port on the bluetooth. However, their customer service was excellent and upon notifying them about a week ago, today I received a replacement bluetooth with no hustle whatsoever. (by the way before the other battery could even completely drain and die, I got mail. Impressive battery life.) A great Christmas Gift for any Motorcyclist.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, Too small
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, Seems like a great design and I like a LOT of the features of this helmet. Bluetooth worked well, speakers were plenty loud. Phone calls inside the helmet were a little muffled but NOT bad. I did NOT wear this riding however. The problem? I wear an XL Helmet and this one (XL) was too small. It fits really tight around the forehead and was not comfortable. Company DID offer to return with apologies and I will be sending this back, but the company does not make an XXL which was disappointing. If you are an XL I would avoid this helmet until they make them in XXL.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Yesus

customer_reviews.title: It saved my head from being crushed.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok speakers work but could be louder. the louder is gets the worse the sounds quality gets. the helmet did save my head from being crushed between a guard rail and my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Deecentt
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really nice helmet. Very comfortable, very functional and overall decent sound quality. Play time is amazing on the speakers. Only issue I had was that the female end of the power port broke before I even charged it for the third time. And a replacement cost 45 bucks! Plus shipping! Only wish they would’ve been more understanding when the part broke within seven days of receiving the helmet. Only charged the battery two times. So far that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kenley

customer_reviews.title: Other then that nice helmet, and sound quality is not the greatest ...
customer_reviews.text: Careful with the battery. The battery charging port broke on me after the first day of use. Costs $40 to replace. Other then that nice helmet, and sound quality is not the greatest but better then nothing. Once again battery charging port is very Fragile.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: fit is odd.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works fine but the fidelity of the speakers is just so so. over 45 MPH i could hear nothing.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MCKENNA

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The size chart runs very small, order a large and it fit my 12 year old grandson. Now I have to wait another 10 days after waiting 2 weeks. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Garf Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this helmet. It makes me look like a power ranger kinda, but I like that I can listen to music and talk on the phone through the integrated Bluetooth. Makes the helmet very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: May be good helmet for small heads but Will Not Fit Large Heads
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is made in only one actual size with cushioning added inside to "fit" a specific head size. Large heads such as mine will not fit inside this helmet. Note that manufacturer states that "The helmet is a little smaller than normal helmet" which is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this helmet for the past 5 months. I love it. It is comfortable, the Bluetooth works great. Not yet had a chance to test the intercom, but so far I have been pleased. The only complain I have is that I did not realize it does not have a D-ring, so I cant use my bike's helmet lock with it, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: NasMas Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I can live with it but would invest in better quality provided the right circumstances
customer_reviews.text: Was not surprised with the quality received for price. Could not find a flip up with integrated BT with 2 day delivery which was mandatory for me. The left speaker has a buzzing sound when volume is turned up. I can live with it but would invest in better quality provided the right circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Quinn

customer_reviews.title: No two way communication
customer_reviews.text: I found the helmet to be a little uncomfortable but suitable. It needs a little more padding and better speakers. Two way communication would be a plus. Use in the summer of Southeast Tx. heat this really came in handy when it came to ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Terry

customer_reviews.title: Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves it. You can bluetooth your phone and hear great when you listen to music or when people call.
customer_reviews.author: amber Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet didn't know it had an FM radio built in havnt got to ride yet but did try it on and paired my phone to it works great
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Bad helmet
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. That's it. Road noise is awful. You can not hear the other people that have this same helmet. The interference and mic pick up is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I picked this helmet up for the Bluetooth and flip up front. Works great only downside is the speakers are not all that great. Has no bass whatsoever sounds good in a way and gets pretty loud but for the price it’s what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Darcel

customer_reviews.title: Very good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet, only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because it does give me a slight headache. But I believe that's only because it is slightly heavier than my last helmet.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa smith

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues x2
customer_reviews.text: this product is Ok, until the battery dies and it will not charge again. emailed them and they were nice and ordered another battery sent from china. second battery the same thing. would not charge. not indicator light ever came on. I am going to ask them to take it back. Also the sound quality is weak at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and bang for the buck. My only issue was the Bluetooth device didn’t volume up and down as it was supposed to. Contacted customer service and got a quick response. I was offered a partial refund, or to return the helmet. Decided to keep it and take the partial refund. Happy with the helmet, and great customer service. I would buy again when I need the next one maybe with a different Bluetooth module.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok helmet
customer_reviews.text: Rode 400 miles today wearing this helmet. It hurt my forehead and chin. The sound quality of the speakers was ok, barely audible when going 90 on a Harley. But is ok when going the speed limit. Calls were great, the other side of the phone couldn't tell I was riding. I'm hoping that a few more rides will make this helmet more comfortable. Great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth is clear, great helmet at a good price. Lightweight, easy to use BT volume control, even with thick gloves. Ordered XL even though measuring head said to get large, but only time I wear a full face is if temps drop below 50o and then I usually wear balaclava underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth money, but visor fogs up
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, but the visor fogs up very bad in cold weather and the Bluetooth is good but only at low speeds. Fix the fog up problem and I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: trucker steve

customer_reviews.title: Might need a smaller one than what they call for
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this i ordered a medium but got a xl they were nice and sent me the padding for it but the size of the med is still too large according to the chart it should fit my head. If they contact me and fix it I will update the rating and my review the customer service was awesome tho they sent out the replacement quick so that’s a thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Nathan g.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Visor broke and paid $20 for new one,  only to wait for 30 days - still waiting!
customer_reviews.text: Speakers not good quality. Scratches very easily. Cannot be connected to another helmet and have bluetooth to the phone at the same time. Battery cover has to be removed to charge, fitment is poor for cable over the cover.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: ILM Bluetooth Integrated Modular Flip up Full Face Motorcycle Helmet Sun Shield Mp3 Intercom (L, Matte Black)
feature_bullets: Bluetooth 3.0 Technology. 8 Hours of Talk Time and 110 Hours of Standby. Fully Washable Microfiber Liner and Adjustable Vents.
One Touch Control for Calling, Answering, Rejecting Incoming Calls and Redialing. Incoming Phone Call Overrides Intercom, Music, FM Radio and GPS Navigation Audio.
Supports a Max distance of up to 1000 Feet Between Two Riders Using the Intercom. 2 High Quality Built-in Speakers with Full Stereo Sound.
Meets or Exceeds both ECE and DOT Safety Standards. DSP Echo Cancellation and Noise Suppression Technology Offers High Quality Voice at High Speeds.

Known issues with the Bluetooth System -- When the helmet Bluetooth system hasn’t been used for a long time, the battery will enter deep sleep mode. During this time, Bluetooth mode may not be available. To wake the battery up, charge the battery for about half an hour. After this charge, Bluetooth functionality will be restored.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars754 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
